metadata.title: monimpression - Customize Your Products
metadata.description: Custom printing shop: t-shirts, hoodies, mugs, masks.

hero.title: The modern custom clothing shop.
hero.subtitle1: Customize your t-shirts, hoodies and accessories online.
hero.subtitle2: Built to last, printed here, delivered everywhere.

section1.title: Create your custom piece or let us do it for you
section1.description: Design custom clothing and accessories online (t-shirts, hoodies, caps, mugs, etc.). Choose your model, upload your visuals, add text and preview in real time — we take care of the rest.

section2.title: Choose a design that buzzes
section2.description: Browse hundreds of ideas for clothing and accessories, or create your own design. Save your mockups and order with one click.

whyChoose.title: Why choose monimpression?
whyChoose.reason1: Good quality, fair prices, custom made
whyChoose.reason2: Fast production (often 5 to 15 minutes for small items)
whyChoose.reason3: Wide variety of clothing and accessories

whyCustom.title: Why create a custom garment or accessory?
whyCustom.reason1: To get a piece that reflects you
whyCustom.reason2: To make a unique and memorable gift
whyCustom.reason3: For your events, your team, your business

advantages.title: Advantage of monimpression shop VS competitors
advantages.advantage1: Local service in Montreal + Shop open 7 days
advantages.advantage3: No surprises on quality and guarantee of our shirts

productionTime.q: How long to produce a t-shirt?
productionTime.a: Most small orders are ready in 5–15 minutes in-store. Online, expect 1–3 business days depending on workload.

imageFormats.q: Which image formats do you accept?
imageFormats.a: PNG/JPG recommended. For logos, an SVG or high‑resolution PNG gives the best result.

frontBack.a: Yes. Our tool lets you choose the print area and position your design.

volumeDiscounts.a: Yes, contact us via the Quote page for a tailored price.

about.title: About monimpression
about.p1: We’re proud to customize your apparel and accessories. Starting with t‑shirt printing, our team now covers everything printable with consistent quality and fast turnaround.
about.p2: Visit our shop or use our online studio to create the perfect product.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: We respect your privacy. Your information is used to process orders and improve your experience. We do not sell your data.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.p1: By using this site, you agree to our terms. monimpression custom products are made to order and are non‑refundable except for manufacturing defects.
